text:
How do I reload kitty config?
There are two main ways to reload the kitty config:

1. Using keyboard shortcut:
```
ctrl+shift+f5
```

2. Using the command line:
```bash
kitty @ reload-config
```

Both methods will reload the configuration file without requiring you to restart kitty. Any changes you've made to your kitty.conf file will take effect immediately.

Note: Some settings may require a full restart of kitty to take effect.
